Kiwi.Plugins.AiTree Class

AI Tree plugin, providing intuitive, powerful AI trees to the designer.

Methods

getTime

() Number public

Defined in src/ai-tree-1.0.0.js:16

Uses various methods to seek the best available time in millis. This method uses high precision time, so it is possible to specify decimal milliseconds; however this feature is only available in compatible browsers.

Returns:

Number:

Current time in milliseconds
